en.title: Artur's CV
en.targetVacancy: Senior Node.js backend developer/Middle Rust developer
en.about:
Started programming in the 8th grade. Live in St.Petersburg.
I have more than 6 years of professional Node.js development. Have experience with SQL and NoSQL databases, in memory storages, message brokers, etc. Also have experience with Rust development. I understand main async conceptions, data structures and algorithms. Familiar with tokio, actix, actix-web, hyper, serde
In my spare time I play guitar and drums. Have a musical band

progress.title: Southern Federal University in Taganrog
progress.description:
Faculty of information technologies security.
Specialty information security of automated systems

progress.title: Lodoss Team
progress.description: Outsource web development. Mainly I developed Node.js back-end REST applications

progress.title: SWC (Speedy Web Compiler)
progress.description: Ported eslint rules from JS to Rust with SWC api

progress.title: R-Vision
progress.description: Develop a system for aggregation and automation for threat intelligence and SGRC purposes

progress.title: Esq Dev
progress.description: Work with two projects. First project is CRM system for attorneys and bookkeepers. Second project is cards and budgets management system

en.hobbies: Have a two general hobbies: writing programs (unexpectable, really?) and playing/writing/recording music.
